title: Oxidative Cleavage of β-O-4 bonds in Lignin Model Compounds with Polymer-Supported Ni-Salen Catalysts

Qiongli Liu , Dianyong Yang, Xiuge Zhao, Zhiwei Xu, Ji Ding, Danqi Wu , Ning An, Huiying Liao, Zhenshan Hou
The transition metal-catalyzed lignin oxidative cleavage reactions have attracted considerable attention. In this work, the polymerized ionic liquid-tagged Salen ligands have been initially synthesized, followed by anion exchange, and then...
